entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 7.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 7.4°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 6.7°C
Wind: ESE 26 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
